# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(conclave-server-lib STATIC 
  connection_quality.c
  req_list_rooms.c
  req_login.c
  req_ping.c
  req_room_create.c
  req_room_join.c
  req_room_rejoin.c
  room.c
  room_connection.c
  room_connections.c
  rooms.c
  server.c
  unique_id.c
  user_session.c
  user_sessions.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(conclave-server-lib)

target_include_directories(conclave-server-lib PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(conclave-server-lib PUBLIC 
  conclave-serialize
  guise-session-client
  flood
  imprint
  monotonic-time
  secure-random
  datagram-reassembly
  stats)
